Class AnalyzerGridComponent

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class AnalyzerGridComponent
extends GridComponent
    Implementation of the class GridComponent used for displaying a grid of the result of all Analyzers present in a given AnalyzerManager
    Author:
    ketsio

                     UserMap users,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height)
        Parameters:
        parrent - the PApplet of the application
        am - the analyzer manager containing all the analyzers to display
        users - the map of users of the application
        x - the x coordinate of the position

        width - the width of the component
        height - the height of the component
